amendment.description: An amendment numbered 23 printed in Part B of House Report 118-30 to allow wildfire mitigation activities within 300 feet of a road on Federal lands to be carried out without regard to NEPA or ESA requirements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. LaMalfa.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
